system.effect: When Performing Astro-Telepathy inside this component, Astropaths gain +10 to Focus Power Tests and Astropath Psychic powers increase their range to 5 VU's. Only one per vessel.

description.value: When Performing Astro-Telepathy inside this component, Astropaths gain +10 to Focus Power Tests and Astropath Psychic powers increase their range to 5 VU's. Only one per vessel.
